Phobia set his position on the moon, and coagulated what limited 
information he'd "Borrowed" from Magmatrons computers, with his 
origional scans. Now that he'd added some cybertronian technology 
with his systems there was a good chance that he wouldn't be blown 
out of the sky if he approached a predicon outpost.

His scans showed a 96% probability of Predicon locations. 

His babies that he left behind conyinued to relay information to him 
on a regular basis so he knew that Magmatrons guests turned down his 
invatation. That would mean that Magmatron would be really pissed off 
when he realized Phobia didn't plan on returning.

He continues scanning the planet to find active Predicon signatures.
